title: Average ticket price Miami Heat ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 72.5 was reached at Year 2012/13
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 67.0 was reported at Year 2011/12
